content: crochet mushrooms this crochet pattern includes written instructions and photos for 2 mushrooms measuring about 4 5cm 1 77″ each languages english us terminology and portuguese materials yarn scheepjes catonal 100% mercerized cotton - fingering hooks 1 75mm or the size you prefer this crochet pattern as well as all the images and text contained are copyrighted by carla vigliucci this pattern or parts of it may not be shared published reproduced altered translated or resold this is a free pattern but that does not mean that i give up on my rights as the creator if you wish to let a friend know of this pattern please don t share the file but ask them to visit my ravelry shop so that they can download it themselves you may sell the finished product handmade by you from this pattern as long as you credit me as the original designer and use your own photos to represent your work you can find here email carla vigliucci@gmail com etsy https //www etsy com/shop/carlavigliucci ravelry https //www ravelry com/designers/carla-vigliucci instagram https //www insthookram com/carla vigliucci/ facebook https //www facebook com/handmadebycarlavigliucci
